About Me

Hello! I am a current software engineering student jumping into the field at the deep end! I am still navigating the engineering ecosystem, but I am currently interested in blockchain development, low latency systems, and web app development.

{ } in @

My Journey

Education - BSc Criminology with Quantitative Methodologies @ QUB

2021 - 2024

Studied criminology with a major focus on statistical modelling: OLS regression and multilevel modelling.

Awarded Ark Academic Achievement certificate for the best single honours dissertation within the school of SSSW

Education - MSc Software Engineering @ QUB

2024 - Present

Studying Software Engineering focused on: Java OOP systems, system architecture, web applications, UX, Cloud, data analytics, software engineering best practices and methodologies.

First Project

2024

Created my first web application - University grade management system for students and admins with complex business rules for student progression.

Stack: Node.js, Express, JavaScript, HTML, CSS(Pico).
